snippet: The media conglomerate hailed its stronger revenue in its cable and movie units, while saying higher costs weighed on earnings.
abstract: Time Warner reports fourth-quarter profit of $983 million, or $1.17 a share, down from $1.11 billion in year-ago quarter; revenue was $8.57 billion, up 5 percent from $8.16 billion;
lead_paragraph: The media conglomerate hailed its stronger revenue in its cable and movie units, while saying higher costs weighed on earnings.

headline.main: Revenue Grows, but Profit Slides 12% at Time Warner
headline.print_headline: Revenue Grows, but Profit Slides 12% at Time Warner
